Package dao

Class CountryDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.CountryDAO
public class CountryDAO extends Object
CountryDAO -- used to connect to the database to allow sql queries.

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Country> loadAllCountries()

      public static Country getCountryId(Country country)
